thread.title: Great little hotel. - Review
thread.title_full: Great little hotel. - Review of Hotel du Petit Moulin, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Jbb B
title: Great little hotel. - Review
text:
We have visited Paris many times and this year we wanted to stay close to the marais but not too touristy.
This hotel is situated close to rue de Bretagne which is a great area with many hip and trendy bars and restaurants with lots of locals
The hotel is part of the SLH chain. Very friendly staff and quirky rooms designed by Christian Lacroix. Our room was very spacious and included a large bathroom with bathtub.
Looking forward to going back!
